duties_responsibilities.duty: Create and execute strategic writing in response to Medicaid request for proposals (RFP) and requests for information (RFI).
Highlight the brand/goals and local flavor/successes in an accurate, compelling, and responsive narrative.
Incorporate baseline material, independent research, approved collateral, and original writing to address RFP or RFI questions aligned with the approved strategy.
Collaborate with subject matter experts (SMEs) to identify and obtain new information to create compliant and responsive RFP responses.
Collaborate with team members and Graphic Designer to create compelling visuals that complement the narrative.
Meet all established deadlines and participate in review meetings.
Remain on-call following review meetings to assist with response changes as requested.
Communicate effectively with all levels of management and work evenings and weekends as needed.
Utilize strong team collaboration skills and execute creative solutions to adapt to changing priorities.
Build relationships, integrate strategies, and deliver successful communication programs at the enterprise level.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience (Master's preferred)
